title: Emprez BI Module - Report: Amounts paid per Payroll for a selected PayPeriod
content: This report will allow you to see the sum of expenses for each earnings code (hours worked, premiums, training...) over a pay period.If you have several payroll companies, this will allow you to compare the expenses of your structures between them, the report will contain several sheets.If you want to compare two pay periods, you will just have to edit two reports by changing the date and the number of the pay period.⚠️ You cannot generate a report for the current payroll period.Find the pay period number on the relevant export report.Here is the report:Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
